channel.title: Another GI Turbo - D3 Blue Dragon Win! [2/8]
channel.description:
### Gameplay
Days will be 10 minutes long. Nights will be 5 minutes long.
### Executions
To accuse someone say **/vote [player]** This game will have Majority and Plurality
### Logs
Anyone may leave logs if they wish
### To Join
To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like “I want to join” or “/join” or “/in” or “sign me up, coach” or whatever you want
### Rolelist:
At least 50%+1 Blue Dragon. Other slots are not guaranteed to roll on anything.
# Playerlist
1. ~~Marshal~~ 2. ~~Magnus~~ 3. Amelia 4. ~~Mercenary/TBE~~ - Died D1 Ascetic Virus 5. Sulit 6. ClonedCheese 7. ~~katze~~ 8. ~~Moleland~~

item.title: Another GI Turbo - D3 Blue Dragon Win! [2/8]
item.dc:creator: MaximusPrime
item.description:
SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2

Town Power? (Passive) - If you are visited by town members, you will impulsively kill them. If you are voted by the town, you will kill one at night, at random.

n ice

Read full topic
item.source: Another GI Turbo - D3 Blue Dragon Win! [2/8]

item.title: Another GI Turbo - D3 Blue Dragon Win! [2/8]
item.dc:creator: Amelia
item.description:
You can also roll

SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2

Watermelon Ice

Neutral Social
Town Power? (Passive) - If you are visited by town members, you will impulsively kill them. If you are voted by the town, you will kill one at night, at random.
No-Vote Scum (Day) - Make all scum votes count as 0 for today. They will still appear to be voting. If this causes the lynch to transfer elsewhere, everyone will be alerted. 2 uses
Ice Shower (Day) - Send this message to everyone: “ An Ice Shower is happening! ” Anyone who leaves their room will be announced tomorrow. 2 uses
Watermelon Ice (Night) - Prevent target player from talking tomorrow. They can still vote in their classcard. If they are town, prevent their vote as well. Inf uses
See the Scum Teams lose the game.

Read full topic
item.source: Another GI Turbo - D3 Blue Dragon Win! [2/8]

item.title: Another GI Turbo - D3 Blue Dragon Win! [2/8]
item.dc:creator: katze
item.description:
but you can also be this

SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2

katsay

Blue Dragon Feline

Nine Lives (Passive) : If you die during the day or night with at least one life, you will consume it and come back to life. You start with nine lives. You are aware of the number of lives you have, and you can lose multiple lives per night if you are attacked multiple times. Strongman attacks will take away 6 lives. You are weakened with every life lost.

9 lives : You are occupation and redirection immune during the day and night. You are also immune to bleeding. You will be informed if you are occupation, redirection, or bleed attempted.
8 lives : You are occupation and redirection immune during the day and night. You are also immune to bleeding.
7 lives : You are occupation and redirection immune during the day and night.
6 lives : You are occupation and redirection immune during the day.
5 lives : You are no longer occupation or redirection immune.
4 lives : You require one less vote to be executed.
3 lives : Your dayvig has a 33% chance of failing, killing nobody.
2 lives : Your dayvig has a 50% chance of backfiring, consuming a life. (It will no longer have a 33% chance of failing)
1 life : You will bleed yourself, and become unable to be targeted by any protective or healing abilities. (Your dayvig still has a 50% chance of backfiring)

confused katze noises (Passive) : Naturally scummy, you are an omnimiller. You show up as Special for class type checks, because you are special. Additionally, if you target a catgirl with any ability, you will join the La Soleil Cafe . Finally, you have a single use of a dayvig you must use each day. To do so, type /dayvig (player name) . If you do not do this, you will have an 87% chance of shooting yourself.
Family of Throwers (Passive) : If @katze and/or @Priestess are in the game, you will be neighborized with them. You must insult them in the neighborhood at least once per cycle, or the neighborhood will disband.
Very Effective FPS (Day) : If you convince a player that you have an ability that you do not have, you will learn one piece of information about that player. This information will either be useless, or false. - infinite uses, can be used multiple times per day
SFoL 60 (Day) : Gain the first day ability from a randomly selected class in the Grand Idea V2 thread. If the randomly selected class has no day ability, reroll until a day ability is selected.
Randomizer (Night) : Gain the first night ability from a randomly selected class in the Grand Idea V2 thread. If the randomly selected class has no night ability, reroll until a night ability is selected.
airplane go brrrrrr (Night) : Take flight in the night sky! All players targetting you tonight will be prevented, bypassing any immunities. You must post a crude drawing of an airplane in the game thread the next day, or be vanillized. - 1 use

Converts into Eye of Arete (755), regardless of the scum faction

Read full topic

I was backed into a corner of unable to claim anything about my class - which is possibly why I fell back on my somewhat flawed logic.

SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2

The “Prince”

Blue Dragon Killer
Openwolfing (Passive) - You are exactly the same as a normal Prince, but you can be converted to the Cult, and you must fake claim exactly Alchemist then exactly Priest before ever true claiming or you will be modkilled.

Defeat the scum team and any harmful neutrals

item.title: Another GI Turbo - D3 Blue Dragon Win! [2/8]
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
Look at this classcard

James%20Charles1200×800 77.7 KB

James Charles

Sister Serial Killer
HEY SISTER (Passive) - All of your actions will give the target a Sister stunning notification. You are also Sister stopping death at night.
I’m a CELEBRITY (Day) - Sister screw another player’s vote silently causing it to be ineffective when casting it towards you. This will also deflect any ITA they use against you and guarantee it hits. - Infinite uses
Morphe Promotion (Day) - Sister spew Morphe propaganda on a player causing them to die. This is only usable on players who have claimed a part of their true flavor. - Infinite uses
The Sister Ship (Night) - Sister ship a player. - Infinite uses

Derail all Jeffree Star Approved™ and Unblendable players off the market by achieving majority in the makeup market.

Do you expect logic while this thing might be in the game
‘Sister screw’
‘Sister spew’
‘Sister ship’
‘Sister Serial Killer’

Read full topic

item.title: Another GI Turbo - D3 Blue Dragon Win! [2/8]
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
I don’t necessiariy agree.

But, sorry if I came on a bit heated, but I guess from your perspective, the game looked like

Dead bd

You (Bd)
3 unknowns in wagon
1 same alignment

1 same alignment (Bd or scum. Will resolve later)
2 unknowns

And only 4 guranteed bd… I can see why voting any unknown was likely ok. Particularly if you wrongly interpreted my logic as spew instead of truth.

Read full topic

so I voted you for it because it felt like a weak justification
